metadata.title: CVE-2023-52500 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:pm80xx: Avoid leaking tags when processing OPC_INB_SET_CONTROLLER_CONFIGcommand Tags allocated for OPC_INB_SET_CONTROLLER_CONFIG command need to befreed when we receive the response.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
